description: This file contains mock implementations and external references for unit testing functions related to system events (`sysevent`). It defines external variables and functions that simulate system event behavior for testing purposes, specifically mocking `sysevent_set_unique` and `sysevent_set` calls.

methods.name: int sysevent_set_unique(const int fd,const token_t token,const char * name,const char * value,char * outbuf,int outbytes)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the `sysevent_set_unique` function, which delegates the call to the `g_syseventMock` object if it exists.

methods.name: int sysevent_set(const int fd,const token_t token,const char * name,const char * value,int conf_req)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the `sysevent_set` function, delegating to the `g_syseventMock` object if it exists.

ctags.name: sysevent_set
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int sysevent_set(const int fd, const token_t token, const char *name, const char *val/
ctags.signature: (const int fd,const token_t token,const char * name,const char * value,int conf_req)

ctags.name: sysevent_set_unique
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int sysevent_set_unique(const int fd, const token_t token, const char *name, const ch/
ctags.signature: (const int fd,const token_t token,const char * name,const char * value,char * outbuf,int outbytes)
